tool_description: Typing in bank details like the account number and IFSC is slow and cumbersome. Enable your customers to pre-fill their onboarding forms by letting them upload or scan a cheque – IDfy’s Cheque OCR API will digitize the document for you instantly!
name: Cheque India OCR
title: Cheque India OCR

api_list.name: Cheque India OCR
api_list.description: Typing in bank details like the account number and IFSC is slow and cumbersome. Enable your customers to pre-fill their onboarding forms by letting them upload or scan a cheque – IDfy’s Cheque OCR API will digitize the document for you instantly!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cheque-india-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_cheque"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cheque-india-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://cheque-india-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_cheque"
